Articles.Content:
Making a space station with completely KSO launched parts. No other launchers. But there's one issue, and that is that the KSO mod's included extra wide shuttle doesn't work. WinRar keeps saying it's corrupt. If there's a download mirror for the KSO mod that I was too stupid to see please send me the link! Thanks.

Anyways, when this is done I'll put up a download link to the station's craft files so you can assemble it in orbit.

Mod list will be posted later.

PLEASE NOTE- MY MICROPHONE IS A TURD. I'll sound like a 7 year old most likely but I'm really 13.

Mission 1 - Bringing the station service tug up. Yes, this is the first thing I did.

*****RECORDING RIGHT NOW*****

Plans-

Solar Truss to power station

Science Laboratory

Emergency evacuation pods

Refueling station

Ship construction dock (Area to dock motherships while in construction)

Ion tug to bring station to other planets

Mission arm(Arm with 10-20 docking ports to dock mission ships to, will be on a long truss probably)

Robotic arm(Infernal Robotics, stationkeeping)

SSTO to go with it all(Completely stock SSTO, only part that won't go up on KSO)

KSO Docking Station(The KSO's own docking station clear of the rest of the station)

Habitation Ring(Ring of Hitchhiker modules, also not going up on KSO)

Will publish and add videos later...
Very nice, looking forward to this expanding into something huge!
I just finished the video, posting it now. Might take a few minutes.

Can't edit main post, but YouTube is blabbing about the video being too long, because it's 17 minutes, and I don't exactly have a phone to verify my account with because my brother won't let me use his. No, I'm not asking for anyone's phone number, but I'm just posting this as a status update. I'm wondering if I should just cut the video into two parts.

Can't edit main post, but YouTube is blabbing about the video being too long, because it's 17 minutes, and I don't exactly have a phone to verify my account with because my brother won't let me use his. No, I'm not asking for anyone's phone number, but I'm just posting this as a status update. I'm wondering if I should just cut the video into two parts.

Could you not try something like vimeo.com see if they let you upload longer videos?
Let me know if you need help or want ideas for KSO stations!

I actually do need help, not really with the station, but with finding how to make the KSO wide body shuttle work. All the parts are white and have no collider, and whenever I try to open the zip folder that it came in with WinRar it always says "Checksum error in *file location here*, file is corrupt". It says that for every single part in the mod. Is there a download mirror? It'd be really nice, because MediaFire hates me. Legitimately. I can't even register an account to "speed up downloads".

Also, I did make the second video, and one of five hubs is in orbit with the tug.

I'll check Vimeo and such today to see if those would work.
